channel.title: BUbreakingSectionTwo
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingSectionTwo, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Supreme Court Sides With Truck Driver Fired Over Drug Test
item.description: The driver, Douglas Horn, sued the maker of a product advertised as THC-free under a federal racketeering law, saying he had suffered a business injur...

item.title: Val Kilmer in ‘Batman Forever’ Was a True 1990s Moment
item.description: The actor took only one turn in the famous batsuit. That film, “Batman Forever,” couldn’t be a more representative artifact of its era.

item.title: Eric Adams’s Charges Were Dropped, but His Re-Election Chances Remain Dim
item.description: Even with the dismissal of a five-count federal corruption indictment, Mayor Eric Adams faces an uncertain future.

item.title: The alleged Deel spy just admitted to passing along company secrets in a major scandal rocking the HR world
item.description: “I asked him what he meant. He said he would offer me a monetary award if I agreed to spy on Rippling for Deel.”

item.title: Macy’s to claw back executive bonuses due to accounting scandal
item.description: Macy’s is clawing back more than $600,000 in cash bonuses from executives after an accounting scandal led to inflated pay.

item.title: Eric Trump shares details of new Bitcoin mining venture, including planned Nasdaq ticker
item.description: The son of President Donald Trump said American Bitcoin will become a proxy for the world's largest cryptocurrency

item.title: America’s housing crisis is solvable—if we choose to build
item.description: The housing crisis is not a red or blue issue—it’s a purple issue affecting every community. There’s a win-win solution.

item.title: 2025 has seen an uptick in bad behavior at work—Here’s how leaders can handle the new unruly office

item.title: ‘I’m Here! Can You Hear Me?’: One Family’s Story of Death in Gaza

item.title: Shingles Vaccine Can Decrease Risk of Dementia, Study Finds
item.description: A growing body of research suggests that preventing the viral infection can help stave off cognitive decline.

item.title: Israel Announces Plans to Seize ‘Large Areas’ of Gaza as It Expands Offensive Against Hamas
item.description: The announcement suggests that Israel is shifting tactics to hold on to swaths of the territory, at least temporarily.
